script.text: This is a demonstration of a scripted conversation loaded from a JSON file. The Red Lilist are peaceful and beloved creatures, they live among the people of Garen – in fact there is one in nearly every home – and they help us with our work, building has almost never been a problem thanks to their strength and due to their intelligence, they can perform jobs with almost the same skill as a Garenai.
Each line can have its own voice, speed, and custom delays.

Their blue cousins however, are the incarnation of savagery in the scales, they kill mindlessly even one another, and are entirely unforgiving towards whatever beings dare exist in the same environment as they.
This final line is spoken by a custom-blended character. This voice, is actually a live blend of 3 base voices! This TTS engin, is indeed, very versatile!
